title: Case-Based Instructional Design Competency Development Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Enhancing instructional design capabilities through case analysis and discussion activities in a smartphone-based LMS environment

learning_goals: Learners can establish instructional design plans considering learner characteristics, environmental conditions, and content elements by analyzing real classroom cases
Learners can critically evaluate instructional design problems at three or more levels using peer feedback in case-based discussions
Learners can identify five or more inspiration sources discovered during case analysis and apply them to design decisions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
